commit message: Added the integration with the WordPress.com Reader v2.1
Disable the topics menuItem for the 'Topics' and the 'Details' view.

- Set the previous selected topic in the 'Topic View' during the startup.
- Changed the name of the constant that points to the new Reader URL, by upgrading the version number.

- Removed white spaces and fixed some typos.
- Improved the reader on XLARGE devices by setting back the min number of items to 20.
Reader: Set the activity title to the newly selected topic title.
Added some native UI controls to our new fancy reader.
Manually caching the Topics page.
Added a missing file from the prev commit.
Rotate the RefreshIcon on 'refresh'
Show the detailView in a separate Screen.
Fixes #280
Additional changes to fix cursor jump issues. Also added back some missing code from EditContent.java
Fixes error message from showing when user has selected full size image upload.
Fixes post editor from getting stuck in full screen.
A few more tweaks to make the editor more awesome.
Only go to full screen if touch action is UP
Adding Edit Comment patch from #259. Also updated native reader to use ViewPager and Fragments (Still a WIP)
Updated build to use internal reference for android compatibility library.
Finish read activity when app goes into background.
Created extension of ViewPager (WPViewPager) that disables swiping on the view pager for the mobile reader.
Tweaked the title bar layout a bit, matches up margins a bit better.
Remove sorting on post formats to fix #284. wp-admin doesn't sort either so will leave as-is for now.
Fixes #285 by making sure to only add the caption around the image content at the correct point in the loop.
Fix crash when location wasn't found, needed to be run on uithread.
Fixes #289 by re-initializing the blog id and blog title array to the correct size after adding/removing blogs from the app.
Fix for #290, makes sure we have db and current blog context. Also added fix for crash in reader when going back after tapping the reload button.

Fixes #281 by uploading the excerpt with the post if one exists. I also submitted a core patch for this: http://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/20058.

Also removed extra setContentView call in the reader, props daniloercoli

Modified the function that detects the BB runtime by using the KB article release by RIM http://supportforums.blackberry.com/t5/BlackBerry-Plug-in-for-Android/How-to-Detect-if-an-Android-Application-is-Running-on-a/ta-p/1470313
Native reader updates, changed from using payload to native calls from the javascript interface. Added listeners to communicate up from the fragments to the parent activity.
Added an xhdpi icon (to be replaced with new icon set in 2.1)
Reader: Cache detail page load if available.
Adding patch for #282. Fixed up a few things with the input validation, limited it to 4 digits, only allow integers and it has to be greater than 0.
Added support for Quick Post stats.
Reader tweaks and fixes.
Moved the topics selector to a dialog and added an additional page to view external links.
Set database version to 12.
Add new image size columns for new install.
Adding new db columns for every db version to preserve upgrade stability.
Add new columns for version 11 as well.
Don't add new columns to settings table CREATE statement.
Reader now passes JSON post object to detail view (fast!).
Don't redefine fragments in onResume(), moved them to onCreate()
Fixed f/c when reader activity would resume.
Fixed some warnings reported by the Lint tool.
More cleanup.
Added share url option to reader.
Darker background for up/down buttons in reader detail view.

Added support for Post/Page auto saves every 60 seconds. Also added prompt if user attempts to refresh posts/pages list when there are local changes present to the post or page in order to prevent the refresh from overwriting their changes.
string update. ref: http://wppolyglots.wordpress.com/2012/03/16/weve-added-a-few-more-strings-for-the/#comment-10433
tweaked saved post prompt text again :)
Consulted an English major, switching to 'haven't' instead of 'hasn't'
Updating translation strings
Updated user agent of native reader.
layout improvements
'bit o code cleanup.
Removed some commented code.
Fixes trac #293 by adding a prompt if there's a connection error.
Added new app icon (still under review) and also stopped autosave timer when tapping save button in EditPost
Tweaked viewpost layout: moved buttons to bottom bar and made top bar exclusive for the post title.
Fixes bug where second image added wouldn't be aligned to the center. The space that's needed is added further down in the code anyways so this isn't needed.
Bumping version number to 2.1
Removed extra creating of WordPressDB
Tweaked layout of comment view. It should have more room for translated strings in the footer buttons.
Fixes #296 by not calling onFinishInflate() when updating the blogs list spinner.
Don't cache anything in the reader (Google recommendation)
call initView to get the accounts refreshed after adding an account.
Updated copyright date
Only create the dashboard object if it doesn't exist already.
Don't update the ribbon if there's no current blog set.
Adding CookieSyncManager creation to prevent f/c when the cookies are accessed.
Mobile Reader: Fixed the detail page not loading correctly on first run. Also removed the hybrid auth methods as they aren't needed for Android.
Load the reader page html right after login completes.
Updated app icons. Fixes #286.
Fix editor buttons translations for German.
Fixes bug where more than one image couldn't be added when editing a post. ref: http://android.forums.wordpress.org/topic/i-can-not-upload-multiple-photos-at-the-same-time props mezerkos
Made looping through matched image tags safer.
'New account logo' that matches WordPress.com's current logo layout.
Remove references to Fragments in android manifest.
